model.name: Gloria Flat Loafer
model.disambiguatingDescription: The Gloria flat loafer looks fresh and summery in blue denim, with Monogram denim on the hand-stitched vamp. This extremely supple, lightweight style features an authentic moccasin construction, which testifies to Louis Vuitton's craftsmanship. It is finished with a matching lace with gold-tone tips and a discreet LV Circle accessory.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Denim
  • Denim Blue
  • Outsole with rubber nubs
  • Made in Italy
